description: Complete system overview documenting the license management architecture, protection mechanisms, and key components interaction
Detailed documentation of the hardware fingerprinting algorithms, anti-debugging systems, and runtime integrity verification mechanisms
Documentation of license data models, types (student/startup/professional/enterprise), and their relationships with hardware bindings
Complete documentation of license lifecycle including creation, validation, revocation, and migration processes with state transitions
Technical details of the multi-layer security implementation including tampering detection, VM detection, and cryptographic validation
